titles.title: Recognizing the achievements of America's high school valedictorians of the graduating class of 2011, promoting the importance of encouraging intellectual growth, and rewarding academic excellence of all American high school students.

Recognizing the achievements of America's high school valedictorians of the graduating class of 2011, promoting the importance of encouraging intellectual growth, and rewarding academic excellence of all American high school students.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Honors the valedictorians and graduating seniors of the class of 2011 for their academic achievements and contributions to their communities.
Encourages all valedictorians and graduating seniors to continue their studies.
Supports the continued social engagement of valedictorians and graduating seniors.
